summary: Implement controlled UI/content improvements: expand internationalization to include ES/FR/DE with safe PT fallback and ensure language dropdown lists PT/EN/ES/FR/DE; update footer to include professional reference links (ENISA, CISA, CNCS, Europol) while keeping existing credits, fully responsive, with any icons/assets stored in /assets/.
architectural_notes: Do not modify app structure (routing/layout/root/build config) and do not perform a full rebuild.
Do not touch backend, canisters, or any non-UI logic; only controlled visual/content changes.
Internationalization must fallback to Portuguese when any translation key is missing.
Footer must use text/clickable links only (no certification/audit logos or official seals).
Any icons/assets must be placed under /assets/ and sized 16x16px or be scalable.
known_issues: English currently works only partially; other languages (ES/FR/DE) not yet created.
Footer with international references/links does not yet exist.

existing_features.title: Expand the internationalization system to support Spanish (ES), French (FR), and German (DE) while guaranteeing a safe fallback to Portuguese (PT) for any missing translation key.
Update the language dropdown so it always lists exactly these five options: PT, EN, ES, FR, DE (including appropriate native language names), and selecting an option updates the UI language.

Update the footer to include a professional references line with clickable official links to ENISA, CISA, CNCS, and Europol, while preserving the existing credit 'by HCoragem' and the Internet Computer credit.

Ensure the updated language selector and footer layout remain fully responsive on mobile and desktop, and ensure any images/icons used by these UI elements are served from the frontend public /assets/ path.

new_feature_requests.summary: Internationalization: add ES/FR/DE placeholders, show PT/EN/ES/FR/DE in dropdown, and fallback to Portuguese for missing keys
Footer: keep existing credits and add clickable reference links to ENISA, CISA, CNCS, and Europol; responsive layout; no certification logos; assets in /assets/ (16x16 or scalable)

projectName: Add ES/FR/DE i18n with PT fallback, expand language dropdown, and update responsive footer references
